resources.string: Track the cities you\'ve visited and add photos of your journies. You will be able to see the number of cities visited in the "settings" section on the left.
Simply click on the green "add" button in the lower right corner and then search for any city in the menu. You will need an internet connection for that
After you add a city, you can add or delete photos by clicking on the photo icon above the city.
Add photos from your phone by pressing the "Add Images" button. You can also delete them by pressing "Delete Images" and then pressing on the cross of each individual photo you wish to delete.
You need to allow permissions for the app to work
Search for places you have visited
